notes.title: Conflicts of Interest
notes.p: This study was performed as a collaborative investigation funded by the Konan Chemical Manufacturing Co. Ltd. Masahiro Terasawa, Kaoru Nishiura, and Koichi Matsuda are employees of Konan Chemical Manufacturing Co., Ltd., a chemical company. Other authors declare no conflict of interest directly relevant to the content of this manuscript. The sponsors had no role in the design, execution, interpretation, or writing of the study.
